main event: A report describing a UFO sighting of a hovering object, 50 feet in diameter, changing color from white to blue and back, before speeding away.
interesting points: The object was observed at treetop level, The motion and characteristics of the object align with common UFO descriptions, Its high-speed departure suggests advanced technology, The object appeared to change colors, indicating possible advanced propulsion, Further evaluation of the case is suggested by investigators.
witness description: A person who observed the object from the ground.
